If you have steam, a computer, and 10$, you need to buy this game. This is the staple of gaming just like Half-Life. Now this is quite the journey and not very direct with you in terms of story but you need to put in the effort to make inferences. I played this originally when it come out on the orange box back on the Xbox. Played it again and 100%'d in one sitting. Do not recommend doing that, anyway great game.

This is a really good sequel to Half life in the fact that not much has changed from the first to the second game. You are probably only gonna like it if you liked the first. The biggest thing this game has going for it is that it is a sequel to Half Life. This isn't a bad thing since they are both great games but, if you didn't like the first then don't expect this one to be a whole different game.

99% of the time you will be left asking what the hell do I do? I would like to enjoy the game but at times I feel as if its way too easy or impossible the levels are confusing often with no clear objective.

I first began the series with the first game. I found it ok, but very flawed and most of its mechanics had been done before. Then you get to Half Life 2. In my opinion the most overrated game I have ever played. The combine story is unoriginal and boring, I do not care for anyone in this game, and I have to force myself to finish the game. It gave so many innovations, yet when you strip the game back, everything else is just average.

El juego es de lo mejor que jugu√©. Es espectacular de principio a fin, la jugabilidad es genial y recontra entretenida y poder interactuar con todo en el entorno lo hace mas inmersivo porque hay diferentes formas de jugar el juego.Otra cosa es que aunque el juego salio en 2004 esta a la altura de los juego de ahora y no tenes que pensar "para la epoca que salio estaba bien" porque siempre esta buenisimo. ultra recomendadisimo.
